<<<<<<< HEAD
A catechisme of Christian religion taught in the schooles and churches of the Low-countries, and dominions of the countie Palatine: with the arguments, and vse of the seueral doctrins of the same catechisme By Ieremias Bastingius. And now authorized by the Kinges Maiestie, for the vse of Scotland. Wherunto is adioyned certaine praiers, both publike and priuate, for sundry purposes. Heidelberger Katechismus. English. Bastingius, Jeremais, 1551-1595. aut
[136] p.
Printed by Robert VValde-graue, printer to the Kings Majestie, Edinburgh : 1591.
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis. Signatures: [A]⁴ B-I. Some pages marked. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
